title: Bela Lugosi's Tales From The Grave
description:
Issues 1-3 of 'Bela Lugosi's Tales from the Grave'

Monsterverse Entertainment, 2010-2013, 36-52 pages

Written by Kerry Gammill, Sam F. Park, James Farr, Robert E Brown, Derek McCaw, John Cassady, Joe Freire, Keith Wilson, Martin Powell, Gary D Rhodes, Basil Gogos

Illustrated by Kerry Gammill, Brian Denham, Chris Moreno, Robert E Brown, Rafael Navarro, John Cassady, Paul Garner, Kim Loh, Jeff Preston, Joe Friere, Keith Wilson, Terry Beatty, Bruce Timm, Basil Gogos, Kamil Kochanski

Colored by Brian Denham, Kerry Gammill, Mar Omega, Chris Moreno, Robert E Brown, Kenny Chapman, Terry Beatty, Bruce Timm, Kamil Kochanski

And many, MANY more...

Monsterverse accepts submissions for this horror anthology, and in general. If you think you've got something for them, check out their website for more information. So, clearly, this is a horror anthology.
